{"step_by_step_thinking": "The relevant documents describe various methods for evaluating bone mass and activity, including microradiograms, electronic point-counting, and radionuclide scanning. None of these documents specifically mention micro-computed tomography (micro-CT) as a method for determining the microstructure of maxillary alveolar bone. Therefore, it cannot be concluded that micro-CT is reliable or unreliable based on this information.", "answer_choice": "B"}
